scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run build && SECRETS_MANAGER_KEY='' MAX_AGE='600' mocha
scripts.deploy:kundi-stg: npm run clean && npm run build && sls deploy --stage stg
scripts.deploy:kundi-prod: npm run clean && npm run build && sls deploy --stage prod
scripts.deploy:supi-stg: npm run clean && npm run build && sls deploy --stage supi-stg
scripts.deploy:supi-prod: npm run clean && npm run build && sls deploy --stage supi-prod
